ModMetaData.name: Double Barrel Assault Rifle
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
The Double Barrel Assault Rifle
With two barrels, this assault rifle is a force to be reckoned with as it shoots a little farther than a standard assault rifle due to longer barrels.
Vanilla Assault Rifle Range - 31 Double Barrel Assault rifle - 35. Vanilla Assault Rifle Burst Count - 3 Double Barrel Assault Rifle Burst Count - 6.
All other stats are the same.
